name: Ending Apartheid
description: The struggle to end Apartheid in South Africa was many things: an underground political movement, an international exercise in public relations, and a conventional armed struggle with tanks and fighter planes.  In this game, you play the ANC, and you must bring multi-racial democracy to South Africa.  You must also help to end the civil wars raging on South Africa’s borders by getting the South African Defense Force to pull out of these conflicts.  You have to do all of this while keeping your activists alive and out of prison.  Good luck!
